full_text:
Re: Epstein
From Ray Ormond
To Shirley V. Skipper-Scott
Date 2019/07/26 09:21
Subject: Re: Epstein
Attachments: TEXT.htm, Ray Ormond.vcf

Thanks Shirley.

J. Ray Ormond
Regional Director
Northeast Region
215-521-

>>> Shirley V. Skipper-Scott 7/26/2019 9:09 AM >>>
Good Morning,

Inmate Epstein was assessed by Psychologist services and it has been determined he will remain on Psychological Observation over the weekend and he will be assessed on Monday.

*A Psychologist will assess him each day on the weekend*. Thanks.

Shirley Skipper-Scott
Associate Warden
MCC New York
150 Park Row
New York, New York 10007
Office: 646-836-
Black Berry: 646-423-
@bop.gov

>>> Ray Ormond 7/24/2019 12:16 PM >>>
Thanks Shirley.

J. Ray Ormond
Regional Director
Northeast Region
215-521-

>>> Shirley V. Skipper-Scott 7/24/2019 12:14 PM >>>
Hello,

Epstein is pending a Code 228, Tattooing or Self-Mutilation and I spoke with  who indicated that most likely he will be found competent because he is not mentally ill.

Therefore, he will be pending a UDC hearing. Should he return to SHU, he will be housed with inmate

Page 556
DOJ-OGR-00027267

Good Morning,

Inmate Epstein was assessed by Psychologist services and it has been determined he will remain on Psychological Observation over the weekend and he will be assessed on Monday.

*A Psychologist will assess him each day on the weekend*. Thanks.

Shirley Skipper-Scott

>>> Shirley V. Skipper-Scott 7/24/2019 12:14 PM >>>
Hello,

Epstein is pending a Code 228, Tattooing or Self-Mutilation and I spoke with  who indicated that most likely he will be found competent because he is not mentally ill.

Therefore, he will be pending a UDC hearing. Should he return to SHU, he will be housed with inmate

additional_notes: The document is an email chain discussing the status of inmate Epstein. The emails contain redactions, likely for privacy or security reasons.
